explanations.reason: The paper focuses on analyzing the impact of public sentiment on G7 debt markets during the Russia-Ukraine war using quantile-on-quantile regression (QQR) and rolling window wavelet correlation (RWWC) methods. It does not mention or utilize any machine learning techniques, neural networks, or related methodologies listed in the keywords. The study is grounded in behavioral finance and econometrics rather than machine learning or artificial intelligence.
